chunk:
ATTITUDE Oceanly Phyto-Matte Face Cream

Brand: ATTITUDE

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed wax, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, jojoba esters, dicaprylyl ether, argania spinosa (argan) kernel oil, glycerin, myrica cerifera (bayberry) fruit wax, undecane, caprylic/capric triglycerides, tride

triglycerides, tridecane, zea mays (corn) starch, behenyl behenate, maranta arundinacea (arrowroot) root powder, aqua/water/eau, polyhydroxystearic acid, sucrose laurate, sucrose stearate, acacia decurrens flower wax, polyglycerin-3, euphorbia cerifera (candelilla) wax, glycogen, hydrolyzed soy protein, nasturtium officinale (watercress) extract, r

tercress) extract, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, rice amino acids, caprylhydroxamic acid, glyceryl caprylate, hydrolyzed adansonia digitata (baobab) seed extract, proline

Directions: Push up tube. Apply evenly to a clean face and massage until completely absorbed. Use our face serum as a first step for best results. Can be used d

sults. Can be used day and night.

Warnings: Store at a temperature below 90 F. Avoid contact of the packaging with water. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.
